comments:
Exception is thrown when deleting all palette colors[0001]
Build number:
2.2.0.v200701250630
Steps to reproduce:
1.open attached reportdesign
2.new a multiple dials meter chart and use the script data set with three dials
3.select the chart and go to Series Palette ,delete all the colors,then click the color
Expected result:
can add a coloe
Actual result:
Exception is thrown

Created an attachment (id=57567)
Report design to reproduce
Don't let the user delete all colors in the UI.

User cannot delete all palette entries in UI.

The issue is caused by the computation of entry index.
Fixed by using while loop to validate the palette entry index.
